title: Actions
content:
Take the shape of a dire wolf that can increase its allie's movement speed and leave its Enemies vulnerable.Your wolf shape has 18 hit points.

Create a cloud of magical darkness and immediately attempt to Hide. Creatures within the cloud are Heavily Obscured and Blinded. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of the darkness.

Gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against celestials, fiends, and undead.

Use your blessed touch to heal a creature or cure it of all diseases and poisons.
